body: please use our https://raw.github.com/owncloud/core/master/issue_template.md as described here https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/contributing.md

### expected behaviour
uploading abstract binary file.

### actual behaviour
file is placed in the server file system, but do not like to be cached in fscache db table.

### steps to reproduce
upload abstract binary file with unknown mime type.

### logs
### database log
                21889 prepare   insert into `oc_fscache`(`parent`, `name`, `path`, `path_hash`, `size`, `mtime`, `ctime`, `mimetype`, `mimepart`,`user`,`writable`,`encrypted`,`versioned`) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
                21889 query     set @0 = '4'
                21889 query     set @1 = '27.log'
                21889 query     set @2 = '/****/files/27.log'
                21889 query     set @3 = 'de8fda82c5fc91db8d48105o655051yy'
                21889 query     set @4 = 713
                21889 query     set @5 = 1359546942
                21889 query     set @6 = 1359546942
                21889 query     set @7 = null
                21889 query     set @8 = null
                21889 query     set @9 = '*****'
                21889 query     set @10 = 1
                21889 query     set @11 = 0
                21889 query     set @12 = 0
